Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 Assault Rifle Black
Description: The FN SCAR (Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle) is an assault rifle developed by Belgian manufacturer Fabrique Nationale Herstal for the SOCOM to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. SCAR-H, for "heavy", is chambered in 7.62Ã—51mm NATO and available in Close Quarters Combat (CQC), Standard (STD), and Long Barrel (LB) variants.
